column2:
Each faculty of the Studium has a list of requested deliveries. **Rurusha** of the **Faculty of Archaeology** will accept items from **blacksmiths**, **armorers**, and **goldsmiths**. The items requested will vary according to your level, and may be crafted by any of the corresponding classes. To begin the crafting process, select **Logs** from the main menu, followed by **Crafting Log**. Next, select **Special Recipes** from within the requisite crafting discipline, then **Class**, and lastly **Studium Deliveries** to locate the desired recipe. The esteem gauge will build with each successful delivery. Fill the gauge completely and your **esteem level** will increase, allowing you to progress through the story.

Studium Deliveries take the form of collectables, and you are able to submit multiple items simultaneously. Items with a higher collectability do not result in a larger increase in esteem, but you will receive greater rewards upon delivery.
